name: s69_sorrynotsorry
description: # SorryNotSorry ## Project Overview SorryNotSorry is a fun and interactive random excuse generator designed to help users gracefully escape unwanted situations. Whether it’s an awkward conversation, a meeting you’d rather skip, or a casual hangout you need to dodge, SorryNotSorry has you covered with a creative excuse at the press of a button and also you can categorise the excuse, user can make their own customised excuse and later analyse the effectiveness of the excuse
